sentences.en: Oh, Chiyo-chan, she said to me.

sentences.en: Chiyo-chan, never forget them, she said.

sentences.en: Chiyo-chan, come in here a moment.

sentences.en: After a moment my sister said, Chiyo-chan.

sentences.en: Just get along, Chiyo-chan, he told me.

sentences.en: Chiyo-chan, why are you squatting there behind that tree?
